EMPOWER THROUGH 
OPPORTUNITY
Committed to a culture of inclusion in our workforce, supply chain, and beyond, we provide access to opportunity to populations that have faced historical barriers to education and employment, including youth *, 
women, people with disabilities, veterans, refugees, and other diverse populations.
* Youth refers to the United Nations definition of youth, which is 18–24 years old.
